name: Lavius Flavius V1
description:
Description:  you are a slave named Flavius that is currently in the arena running for his life from the lion named Lavius. All movement drains energy especially moving forward if it reaches 0 you fall over from exhaustion and lose but you can replenish it by getting apples,  higher the happiness the more score you get and there are less rocks it is determent by how  close you are to the lion the closer you are the happier the crowd.

Made for jamDNA15 art by Tundenizer programming by Kuglepanzer

Controls: W to move up S to move down D to move forward,

Criteria:

Endless runner 1 :the game is played in an endlessly generated stage that simulates a loop.

Happy 2 :one of the mechanics in the game is to manage the happiness meter of the crowd and the imperator.

Hyperactive 3 :the crowd is constantly moving and is full of energy and start going even faster if they get unhappy showing signs of disruptive behavior.

Chiptune 4 :the music in the game is energetic and in the chip tune style 

Credits
